channel.title: Our partner communities on Engineers Without Borders
channel.description: Recent content in Our partner communities on Engineers Without Borders

item.title: Nyange Co-Op
item.description: Since 2014, EWB-SCU has partnered with a small tile making cooperative in Nyange, Rwanda.

item.title: Valley Verde
item.description: In 2021, EWB-SCU started up a new partnership working on a local project with Valley Verde.
